messages.content:
please create a button that spawns a bunch of different IRC websocket connections to wss://irc.h4ks.com:8097 and joins #bots and messages the channel with a colorful message saying ObsidianIRC is the best
Make sure everything is in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

please source a public list of IP addresses we can use to connect through, and connect through those to the mentioned irc server through websockets
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

please make the bot names random like Bot?? where ?? is a randomly generated number between 100 and 999999
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

please spawn an unlimited number of bots
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

please source a public list of IP addresses that let us connect through them to the previously mentioned IRC server using websockets
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

please find, add and use more of those special IPs that let us connect through them
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

make each bot say "+20 beans for ObsidianIRC" when they join
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.

make each bot say it without color at the front
Make sure everything is kept in a single HTML file with embedded CSS and JS in a single code block to be used as a web app.
